entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Trois-Pistoles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
